item.title: Librenms Deploy Librenms With Docker Container
item.author: Author
item.description: How to deploy librenms monitoring system with docker container Librenms is a very light and easy handle moniting software. It is suitable for us to monitoring server,networdevice, printer etc via snmp. At now, docker is easy for software deployment. After deploy librenms in ubuntu vm, I have a try to deploy librenms with docker-compose. Install librenms with docker-compose 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 mkdir -p librenms-docker-compose cd .
